message:
[Action Options]
1) MOVE <target>, <target> can only be a cube.
2) SWEEP <target>, this moves the groom so it pushes the <target> into dustpan, only Bob can SWEEP, Alice must WAIT in front of the same <target> cube when Bob SWEEP.
3) WAIT, stays at the current spot.
4) DUMP, only when there are one or more cubes in the dustpan, Alice can DUMP it into trash_bin.
Only SWEEP a cube after both robots MOVEed to the cube.
[Action Output Instruction]
Must first output 'EXECUTE
', then give exactly one action per robot, put each on a new line.
Example#1: 'EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE red_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE red_cube_1
'
Example#2: 'EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP red_cube_1
'
Example#3: 'EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION DUMP
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE green_cube_1
'

[History]
== Round#0 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, since yellow_cube_1 is the closest target that we need to sweep, let's both MOVE to it. I'll take the side closer to the gripper's current position. 

PROCEED
[Bob]:
Alice, I agree that we should target yellow_cube_1 first. However, yellow_cube_1 is not the closest cube that we need to sweep. The closest one is yellow_cube_2 at a distance of 0.48 from my current position. Let's both MOVE to yellow_cube_2 instead. I'll take the side opposite to your approach.

PROCEED
[Alice]:
Bob, I've double-checked the distances, and it seems there's a slight misunderstanding. The closest yellow cube to me is indeed yellow_cube_1 at a distance of 0.49, not yellow_cube_2. Let's stick to the original plan and both MOVE to yellow_cube_1. I'll wait for your confirmation.

PROCEED
[Bob]:
Alice, I apologize for the confusion. I have re-evaluated the distances, and you are correct. Yellow_cube_1 is indeed the closest yellow cube to us. Let's proceed with the original plan and both MOVE to yellow_cube_1. I will take the side opposite to you.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_1
[Executed Action]
Alice: MOVE yellow_cube_1
Bob: MOVE yellow_cube_1
== Round#1 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, we have successfully moved to yellow_cube_1. Now, I will WAIT here while you SWEEP yellow_cube_1 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_1
[Bob]:
PROCEED
[Alice]:
PROCEED
[Bob]:
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_1
[Executed Action]
Alice: WAIT
Bob: SWEEP yellow_cube_1
== Round#2 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, with yellow_cube_1 now in the dustpan, we should MOVE to the next closest yellow or green cube. I suggest we MOVE to green_cube_3, which is at a distance of 0.43 from my current position. Please confirm if that's also the closest to you, or suggest an alternative.

PROCEED
[Bob]:
Alice, I concur that we should continue with the yellow and green cubes. However, green_cube_3 is not the closest to me. The closest green cube to my current position is green_cube_1, which is at a distance of 1.24. I suggest we both MOVE to green_cube_1. Please confirm if this works for you.

PROCEED
[Alice]:
Bob, I agree that we should MOVE to green_cube_1 as it is the closest green cube to you. It is also within a reasonable distance from me. Let's both MOVE to green_cube_1.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE green_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE green_cube_1
[Executed Action]
Alice: MOVE green_cube_1
Bob: MOVE green_cube_1
== Round#3 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, we are now both in front of green_cube_1. I will WAIT here while you SWEEP green_cube_1 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_1
[Bob]:
PROCEED
[Alice]:
PROCEED
[Bob]:
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_1
[Executed Action]
Alice: WAIT
Bob: SWEEP green_cube_1
== Round#4 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, we have two cubes in the dustpan now. I will DUMP them into the trash_bin, and you should MOVE to yellow_cube_2, which is the closest target for us to sweep next.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION DUMP
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_2
[Bob]:
PROCEED
[Alice]:
PROCEED
[Bob]:
Alice, your plan sounds good. I will MOVE to yellow_cube_2 while you DUMP the cubes in the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION DUMP
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_2
[Executed Action]
Alice: DUMP
Bob: MOVE yellow_cube_2
== Round#5 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, now that I've dumped the cubes, we should MOVE to yellow_cube_2, which you are already in front of. I will MOVE to yellow_cube_2 to prepare for the next SWEEP.

PROCEED
[Bob]:
Alice, that sounds like a good plan. Since I'm already in front of yellow_cube_2, I will WAIT for you to MOVE to yellow_cube_2 so we can SWEEP it together in the next round.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_2
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
[Executed Action]
Alice: MOVE yellow_cube_2
Bob: WAIT
== Round#6 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, we are both in position to sweep yellow_cube_2. I will WAIT here while you SWEEP yellow_cube_2 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_2
[Bob]:
PROCEED
[Alice]:
PROCEED
[Bob]:
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_2
[Executed Action]
Alice: WAIT
Bob: SWEEP yellow_cube_2
== Round#7 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, with yellow_cube_2 now in the dustpan, we should MOVE to the next closest target. I suggest we MOVE to yellow_cube_3, which is at a distance of 0.25 from my current position. It seems to be the closest cube for us to sweep next. Please confirm if this works for you or suggest an alternative.

PROCEED
[Bob]:
Alice, I agree with your suggestion. Yellow_cube_3 is indeed the closest cube for us to sweep next. It is at a distance of 0.30 from my current position. Let's both MOVE to yellow_cube_3.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_3
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_3
[Executed Action]
Alice: MOVE yellow_cube_3
Bob: MOVE yellow_cube_3
== Round#8 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, we are both in front of yellow_cube_3 and ready to sweep it. I will WAIT here while you SWEEP yellow_cube_3 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_3
[Bob]:
PROCEED
[Alice]:
PROCEED
[Bob]:
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_3
[Executed Action]
Alice: WAIT
Bob: SWEEP yellow_cube_3
== Round#9 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, with yellow_cube_3 now in the dustpan, we should MOVE to green_cube_2 as it is the only remaining cube we need to sweep. It is at a distance of 0.69 from my current position. Please confirm if this works for you or suggest an alternative.

PROCEED
[Bob]:
Alice, I agree that we should MOVE to green_cube_2. It is the last cube we need to sweep and it is at a distance of 0.80 from my current position. Let's both MOVE to green_cube_2.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE green_cube_2
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE green_cube_2
[Executed Action]
Alice: MOVE green_cube_2
Bob: MOVE green_cube_2
== Current Round ==


You are a robot called Alice, and you are collaborating with Bob to sweep all yellow cube and green cube on the table and dump to the trash_bin as quickly as possible.
You hold a dustpan. 
To sweep up a cube, you and Bob must get close to it by MOVE to opposite sides of the same cube. You must WAIT at the same cube while Bob SWEEPs.
Talk with Bob to coordinate together and decide which cube to sweep up first.
At the current round:
Your gripper is at (1.43, 0.09, 0.23), holding dustpan, in front of blue_cube_1 with distance: 1.51, in front of pink_cube_1 with distance: 0.81, in front of green_cube_2 with distance: 0.14, in front of red_cube_1 with distance: 1.04, in front of green_cube_3 with distance: 1.79
green_cube_1 is at (-1.16, 0.51, 0.19), inside trash_bin; 
yellow_cube_1 is at (-1.26, 0.45, 0.19), inside trash_bin; 
blue_cube_1 is at (-0.11, 0.42, 0.17), on the table; 
pink_cube_1 is at (0.61, 0.56, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_2 is at (1.47, 0.49, 0.17), on the table; 
yellow_cube_2 is at (1.42, 0.27, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
red_cube_1 is at (0.36, 0.48, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_3 is at (-0.39, 0.40, 0.17), on the table; 
yellow_cube_3 is at (1.36, 0.32, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
Think step-by-step about the task and Bob's response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Never forget you are Alice!
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) output PROCEED, if the plans require further discussion; 2) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!
        

[Current Chat]
[Alice]:
Bob, we are both in front of green_cube_2 and ready to sweep it. I will WAIT here while you SWEEP green_cube_2 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_2
[Bob]:
PROCEED
You are Alice, your response is:
